content: Day 1 Security Emergency: Rotate Creatomate API key, remove hardcoded credentials, fix exposed accounts
Fix build configuration - remove error suppressions in next.config.js
Fix all 483 TypeScript errors preventing production builds
Install missing critical dependencies: redis, pg, node-statsd
Fix Supabase client import issues across 47 files
Fix Netlify incompatibilities - file system operations and BullMQ workers
Fix 57 failing tests due to response format mismatches
